About KulaFresh

KulaFresh is a digital marketplace connecting Kenyan smallholder farmers directly with urban consumers. Our mission is to create a fair, transparent, and sustainable food system that benefits everyone.

üéØ

Our Mission

Empowering farmers with direct market access while providing consumers with fresh, affordable produce

üë•

Our Impact

500+ verified farmers, 1000+ satisfied customers, and growing every day
